alert.note: Alert for South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 27 at 1:10AM MST until November 28 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 2 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...South Laramie Range and South Laramie Range Foothills. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 2 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight or high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
